name: magic-guard

effect.sun-moon: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
